content.description: Scramble up several crack systems on set of prominent columns to left of Seventh Circle to gain ledge system above. Move right on ledges to catch top of Seventh Circle. Shares top anchors with Seventh Circle.
content.protection: Gear to 1". Shares top bolt with Seventh Circle. Shares bolt station with Seventh Circle

content.description:
Starts 3rd/4th pillar to the right of the anchor (avoiding the dirty/crumbly and step-ladder like pillars directly below it).  Once you arrive near the 2nd bolt move into the gully.

Smearing/Stemming is the name of the game. Can be done either by staying purely in the gully using stemming for the most part (increases the difficulty some) or it can be done using a few holds on the edges of the route.  Fun climbing, even a short section top half that can be done layback.
content.location: Between Devil in Disguise and Hell Hath no Fury.

content.description: Follows crack to left of prominent pair of columns. Start in next crack left, then switch to main crack next to column, and finish on bolt just below top anchor.
content.protection: Gear to 2.5". One bolt. Bolt station at top.

content.description: Several options. Pull a small roof at start. Left of bolts on prominent column is a bit easier, right on face is a bit harder. 6 bolts to anchors.
Starts right  off as a hellion, but it's an angel in places too. Route stays left of bolt line.  Fun route, some technical sections.
content.protection: 6 bolts to bolt station at top.

content.description: Route follows prominent groove formed by missing column using side-pulls, in-set holds, and a stem or two to reach top anchors.
Climbs crack to right of the four pillars on water-smoothed rock below main drainage.
content.protection: Gear to 2.5". Bolt station on ledge at top.

content.description: Start a bit right on sloping ledges near Good Intentions. Follow 5 bolts in groove formed by inset column to top anchors.

Climbs arete on right-facing dihedral system formed by set of prominent columns. Gear protects easy climbing for first half of climb. Crux moves above are protected by 3 bolts that lead to top anchors.
content.protection: Gear to 1". 3 bolts. Bolt station at top.

content.description: Short but sweet. Start on ramp that leads to left-hand crack of prominent column. Switch to right-hand crack half way up, and finish on ledge at top anchors.
content.protection: Gear to 2". Bolt station at top.

content.description: A Hells Gate test piece. Crimps and smearing stems are sprinkled with just enough in-cut holds to make this spectacular climb go. Git fired-up for this one!

You gotta love basalt columns. Hug these four beauties all at once to inch your way up to the top. Climbs the four pillars at base of main drainage. Good gear placement right at the start, then 4 bolts through the crux moves on the blank face. Finish by using crack on left side for gear to reach anchors on ledge at top.
content.protection: Gear to 1". Four bolts through crux moves. Bolt station on ledge at top.

content.description: Hop, skip, and jump your way back and forth along this fun route. The 1st bolt is just up and to the left of the small roof. The route generally moves rightward as you move up, with the bolts spanning 3 columns. Make a choice at the 3rd bolt to go left or right- both options are interesting and worth trying out.
content.location: New route between "Good Intentions" and "Blast Zone". See beta picture "Good Intentions Section".

content.description: Follows hand crack to right of prominent set of columns.
content.protection: Gear to 2.5". Bolt station at top.

content.description: Follows crack that splits a pair of prominent columns, using the next crack to left in places. Angle right at top to clip final bolt on Hell's Bells and top anchors.
content.protection: Gear to 1". One bolt. Bolt station at top.

content.description: Might be more than you bargained for! Fun climbing on outside of a right-facing dihedral formed by a set of prominent columns for first half of route uses crack in dihedral to right for gear. Bust a move off last piece of good gear (#2 TCU) in the thinning crack to first bolt, which protects crux move above. Clip second bolt to move up to ledge above and anchor on inset column to right.
content.protection: Gear to 1". Two bolts on upper section. Bolt station to right of ledge at top.

content.description: Scramble up to sloping grassy ledge. Follow bolts right, then through small roof and along right side of prominent column to top anchors.

Route starts in left-facing dihedral formed by set of prominent columns to right. Reaches a sloping ledge at about a third of the way up, then follows a fantastic crack for a series of fun moves on prominent column in groove formed by a series of missing columns. Move left to join No Fury once crack runs out at widow-maker towards top.
content.protection: Gear to 1.5". Shares top bot with No Fury. Shares bolt station at top with No Fury.
